Posts.Content: On 2/18/2009 betteanne wrote: Has anyone here suffered pain / nerve damage from the Taxol Chemo treatments?  I have severe foot pain and my hands are still numb from treatments that ended six weeks ago. Thanks I just started chemo yesterday, one of the drugs was Taxol, and the other one is carboplatin.  I will let you know if I feel any pain from it.  I hope you start feeling better soon. Thanks
Posts.Title: Nerve damage from Chemo
